00169 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00170 {
00171     totalTime_ = globalThresholdingTime_ + templateFilteringTime_ + averagingFilteringTime_ + regionsExtractionTime_ + slantingCorrectionTime_\
00172                  + spacesLocationFindingTime_;
00173 };
